TF038685-BOSNIA-HERZEGOVINA:  ENTERPRISE
            & BANKING PRIVATIZATION ADJ. CR.,TF037391-BOSNIA & HERZEGOVINA -
            ENTER & BANKING PRIV,TF036856-BOSNIA-HERZEGOVINA - ENTERPRISE
            AND BANKING PRIV. ADJ. CREDIT,TF023283-DUTCH GRANT FOR BHZ'S EBPAC,TF029669-PHRD-STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT PROGRAM

abstracts.cdata!:
The Enterprise and Bank Privatization
            Adjustment Credit Project for Bosnia and Herzegovina aims to
            fund privatization of enterprises and banks and
            implementation of policy reforms at the entity level.
            Specifically, the project will help 1) develop the design,
            legal framework and regulations, and the institutional
            strengthening and implementing of the program to privatize
            solvent publicly-owned commercial banks and liquidate
            insolvent ones; 2) reform the financial sector to improve
            bank supervision, strengthen banking laws, establish deposit
            insurance systems, and limit public intervention in credit
            markets; and 3) complete the institutional and legal
            framework for enterprise privatization, including rapid
            initiation of small enterprise privatization, and
            preparation for privatization of larger enterprises, holding
            companies, and utilities. In addition, the Credit provides
            support for reforming the legal and institutional framework
            needed for private sector development. The Credit will be
            disbursed in two tranches for budgetary and balance of
            payments support to the two entities of Bosnia and
            Herzegovina. The release of tranches will be linked to
            policy conditionality as agreed.
